system.description:
You have learned to combine the power granted by your elemental abilities and bonded artifact in ways few can fathom, much less emulate. You gain the following benefits:

  • You gain a +1 bonus to your choice of your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma score, to a maximum value of 20.
  • If a spell appears on both the elemental and wielder lists, you may treat your elementalist levels as wielder levels for the purpose of learning and casting it. For example, if a 4th-level spell appears on both your elementalist and wielder lists, you may learn it if your combined wielder and elementalist levels total at least 13.
  • Half your wielder levels count as elementalist levels for the purpose of what Elemental Defense options you have access to.
  • While wielding your Bonded Artifact, your elemental blast’s range increases by 30 feet.
